result.explanation: Invalid or missing ‘mdui:Description’ and/or ‘mdui:DisplayName’ under ‘md:SPSSODescriptor/md:Extensions/mdui:UIInfo’ in language with code ‘en’, or display name (= ‘HiTZ / CLARIAH-ES Repository’) length (= 28) < 5 or > 33, or description (= ‘Various services provided by HiTZ Center (University of the Basque Country, UPV/EHU) in the context of the CLARIAH-ES initiative.’) length (= 129) < 20 or > 100.
result.requirement: Partially a requirement for DFN-AAI registration. Partially a requirement for the GÉANT Data Protection Code of Conduct Entity Category. Completely a guideline for the CLARIN Service Provider Federation.
